3: אוּלַ֣י <sup>194 </sup> <n>Perhaps</n> יִשְׁמְע֔וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>If so be they will hearken</n> וְיָשֻׁ֕בוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and turn</n> אִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> מִדַּרְכּ֣וֹ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>way</n> הָרָעָ֑ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>from his evil</n> וְנִחַמְתִּ֣י <sup>5162 </sup> <n>that I may repent</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>from</n> הָרָעָ֗ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>me of the evil</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אָנֹכִ֤י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> חֹשֵׁב֙ <sup>2803 </sup> <n>which I purpose</n> לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>to do</n> לָהֶ֔ם מִפְּנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>unto them because</n> רֹ֥עַ <sup>7455 </sup> <n>of the evil</n> מַעַלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>4611 </sup> <n>of their doings</n>
